full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer - Miscellaneous Groceries
### Tender Announcement

This is an amendment to the Request for Standing Offer for the provision of miscellaneous groceries to the Government of Canada. 

**Required Documentation and Submission Date**

Please note that the closing time for submission has been amended. The required supporting documentation and bid response must be submitted by October 10, 2023, 14:00 EDT (Eastern Daylight Time).

**Overview of the Request for Standing Offer**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers from suppliers for the provision of miscellaneous groceries to the Government of Canada on an as-needed basis. The Ontario region has been divided into six geographic zones, and the supplier may submit pricing for one or multiple zones:

1. Southern Ontario (1)
2. Central Ontario (2)
3. North Western Ontario (3)
4. North Eastern Ontario (4)
5. National Capital Region (5)
6. Eastern Ontario (6)

### Synopsis of Applicable Material

Suppliers must provide products for the following categories:
* Bread and bakery products (50180000)
* Baking mixes and supplies (50181700)
* Cereal and pulse products (50220000)
* Cereals (50221100)

### Trade Agreements

The Government of Canada welcomes offers from suppliers who have a Trade Agreement or who can demonstrate that they have a Canadian business significant affiliation or holds a valid Canadian Controlled Goods Registration (Heritage ID) as stated by statute.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on price, as per the Request for Standing Offer Agreement.

### How to Submit a Bid

To submit a bid, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform. Suppliers must submit their bids, all required supporting documentation, and pricing for the desired zones by October 10, 2023, 14:00 EDT.

### Contact Information

For inquiries or questions, please contact:

* Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Phone: None
* Email: guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

Please visit the following link for complete details:

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17235879?extsite=MTcyMzU4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Amendments and Terms
Please note that every amendment and/or condition related to this Request for Standing Offer supersedes all previous amendments and conditions. Suppliers must review and agree to all
